DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Administration Sugammadex Impacts Hospital Efficiency
DOC.detailed_description: Participants study group receive single bolus Sugammadex ( 4.0mg/kg ) prior extubation . In post-anesthesia care unit ( PACU ) , blind safety-assessor use visual analog scale clinically assess post-operative pain . Post-operative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) assess use PONV rating scale every 30 minute PACU discharge . All patient monitor continuous pulse-oximetry .
